00108             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00109             {
00110                   try
00111                   {
00112                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00113                         {
00114                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;
00115                         }
00116                         else
00117                         {
00118                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );
00119                         }
00120                   }
00121                   catch( Exception $e )

00149             function                unsafe_select( $Condition )
00150             {
00151                   try
00152                   {
00153                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00154                         
00155                         return( 
00156                               $this->Database->select( '*' , $this->NativeTable , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition" )
00157                         );
00158                   }
00159                   catch( Exception $e )
00160                   {
00161                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00162                   }
00163             }

00203             function                select( $Start = false , $Limit = false , $Field = false , 
00204                                                                                                                         $Order = false , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00205             {
00206                   try
00207                   {
00208                         $Condition = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->select_condition( 
00209                               $Start , $Limit , $Field , $Order , $Condition
00210                         );

00242             function                delete( $id , $Options = ' 1 = 1' )
00243             {
00244                   try
00245                   {
00246                         /* deleting file itself */
00247                         $Files = $this->select_list( $id );
00248                         if( count( $Files ) )
00249                         {
00250                               foreach( $Files as $i => $File )
00251                               {
00252                                     @unlink( get_field( $File , 'file_path' ) );
00253                               }
00254                               
00255                               /* deleting file record */
00256                               $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00257                               $this->Database->delete( $this->NativeTable , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )" );
00258                               $this->Database->commit();
00259                         }
00260                   }
00261                   catch( Exception $e )
00262                   {
00263                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00264                   }
00265             }

00289             function                create( $Record )
00290             {
00291                   try
00292                   {
00293                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00294                               $Record , 'file_path:string;original_file_name:string;preview_image:string,allow_not_set'
00295                         );
00296                         
00297                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00298 
00299                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00300                         
00301                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00302                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_create_uploaded_file' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
00303                         
00304                         return( $id );
00305                   }
00306                   catch( Exception $e )
00307                   {
00308                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00309                   }
00310             }

00334             function                update( $id , $Record )
00335             {
00336                   try
00337                   {
00338                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00339                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00340                               $Record , 'file_path:string;original_file_name:string;preview_image:string' , 'allow_not_set'
00341                         );
00342 
00343                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00344                         
00345                         if( isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00346                         {
00347                               $this->Database->update( 
00348                                     $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )"
00349                               );
00350                               $this->Database->commit();
00351                         }
00352                   }
00353                   catch( Exception $e )
00354                   {
00355                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00382             {
